definitions.definition: An affirmative vote; one who votes in the affirmative.
definitions.example: "To call for the ayes and nays;" "The ayes have it."

definitions.definition: Yes; yea; a word expressing assent, or an affirmative answer to a question.
Always; ever; continually; for an indefinite time.
Used as a tag question, to emphasise what goes before or to request that the listener express an opinion about what has been said.
definitions.example: These hot dogs are pretty good, eh?

definitions.definition: In isolation, a request for repetition or clarification of what has just been said. Compare what, pardon.
An interjection used to ascertain the continued attention of an individual addressed by the speaker
definitions.example: I went to the restaurant, eh, but my friends didn't show up.

definitions.definition: Expressing apathy or lack of enthusiasm; meh.
